infos.value: That's the Sir Owe I wanted to see! What a show!
Not a single one of those soldiers stood a chance, aye!
I guess that means it's our turn, now!
A fight with the great Sir Owe... What fun, aye?
Wh-what...!?
He died where he stood...!
Victory to Dorando and Gargas!
Time to take Owe's head!
Halt!
Don't lay so much as a finger on Owe.
You weaklings don't have that right! Aye!?
You're planning to take all the credit!
Credit!?
Look here, we may be some of the dirtiest scumbags around...
But we still know to give respect where it's due, aye?
We'll let Owe and Helena rest here in peace.
Let them return to the earth, aye!
What make-believe innocence are you going on about!?
Your recklessness led to Helena's death!
I must tell King Muraga of all that has happened here!
Tell...Muraga? Oh, we can't have that, now.
No. No, we can't, aye?
Y-you wouldn't...!
Oh, but we would.
I hope you're ready, aye?
You would betray King Muraga!?
Then I'll kill the both of you!
